name: Rolly Ball
description:
Hence the title, Rolly Ball is about a rolling ball. Bounce, zoom, and fly while avoiding the lava with hard-to-control physics and multiple levels that require many tries.

Note: This was made in 3 days and is not very stable. Let me know what you want to see or be fixed, and don't just hate on it because it's bad. Also, don't suggest things on the to-do list as they are already planned. Thanks!

To-Do List:

  • Add music
  • Add more levels
  • Clean up the project overall
  • Add Sound Effects
  • Make an application icon
  • Have people not complain about how hard it is but respect how hard it is
  • Add more animations
  • Fix any bugs
  • Get on Steam somehow someday
  • Android version with touch controls

Why download now?

  • First 5 downloaders will be listed below. Make sure you're signed in to itch.io. Hey! That rhymes!
  • They will get free-to-download keys if a full version is ever published on Steam.
  • You can help me on my adventure.
  • You can rage.
